select p.PropertyID, p.EstateID, p.EstateName, p.RentalType, p.PropertySource, p.PropertyStatus, p.IsHide, p.RentPrice, p.SaleableAvgPrice, p.UnitFloor, p.RoomNumber, p.SaleableArea, p.BuildingAge, p.PropertyNo, p.EstateAddress, p.BrowseNumber, p.CollectionNumber, n.IntroduceCN, n.IntroduceEN, p.BuildingName, p.PublicTime, p.ApprovalStatus, p.PaymentStatus, g.RegionName, p.TitleCN, p.SaleForm, p.beginrenttime, p.IsLinkParking,
p.ExpireTime, p.CreateTime, p.UpdateTime from property p left JOIN property_introduce n on p.PropertyID = n.PropertyID left join geo_gscope g on g.GscopeCode= p.GscopeCode and g.IsDelete = '0' where p.IsDelete = '0' and p.PropertyID = #{propertyId}

SELECT p.PropertyID, p.EstateID, p.EstateName, p.RentalType, p.TitleCN, p.BeginRentTime, p.SaleForm, p.IsLinkParking, p.PropertyStatus, p.RentPrice, p.SaleableAvgPrice, p.BuildingName, p.UnitFloor, p.RoomNumber, p.SaleableArea, p.EstateAddress, p.BrowseNumber, p.CollectionNumber, p.PublicTime, p.UpdateTime, p.ExpireTime, p.AccountID, p.UserID, p.IsVerifyLabel, pi.IntroduceCN, p.ApprovalStatus, g.RegionName FROM property p left join property_introduce pi on p.PropertyID = pi.PropertyID left join geo_gscope g on g.GscopeCode= p.GscopeCode WHERE p.IsDelete = 0 AND p.PropertyID = #{propertyid} AND (IsVerify=1 or IsVerifyImage=1)

SELECT p.ContactNameCN, p.ContactNameEN, p.Telphone, p.CompanyNameCN, p.IsShowTel, u.ApprovalStatus, u.ImagePath FROM property_userinfo p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.UserID = u.UserID AND u.IsDelete = 0 WHERE p.PropertyID = #{propertyid} AND p.IsDelete = 0
select ImagePath from property_image where IsVerifyImage =0 AND IsDelete =0 and PropertyID =#{propertyid}
select ImagePath from property_image where IsVerifyImage=1 and IsDelete=0 and PropertyID=#{propertyid}
